code: import Swal from"sweetalert2";import store from"../../redux/store/store";import{EditTodo}from"../../redux/state/todoSlice";export function EditAlart(i,item){Swal.fire({text:"Update your task!",input:"text",inputValue:item,inputValidator:value=>{if(value){store.dispatch(EditTodo({index:i,task:value}));}}});}
